LoRa Duplex B with ESP32 T-Beam

dev board LilyGO T-Beam
chip ESP32-DOWDQ6
features LoRa duplex SPI

Before starting

Dependancies

Ensure the following dependancies are downloaded and available:
  • Arduino LoRa firmware

Pre-requisites

Try these simpler or similar examples:
  1. LoRa Duplex A with ESP32 T-Beam

Buy the components

  1. TTGO T-Beam

Code

Download code lora-duplex-b-esp32-t-beam.ino

Makefile

Description

Send and receive at the same time from another node! Use this code with duplex a.

byte localAddress = 0xBB;
byte destination = 0xAA;

References

  1. Arduino LoRa firmware
  2. Arduino LoRa firmware duplex example
  3. SEMTech SX1276/77/78/79 datasheet
  4. Adafruit RFM95W LoRa Radio Transceiver Breakout
  5. LilyGO-T-Beam Arduino Lora sender code example
